_description: Liscribe configuration. Copy to ~/.config/liscribe/config.json to customize.

save_folder.description: Default folder to save recordings and transcripts. Override with -f flag.

default_mic.description: Default input device name or index. null = system default. Override with --mic flag.

whisper_model.description: Whisper model size: tiny, base, small, medium, large. Larger = more accurate but slower.

auto_clipboard.description: Automatically copy transcript to clipboard after transcription. Enabled by default.

sample_rate.description: Audio sample rate in Hz. 16000 is optimal for whisper. Change only if you know what you're doing.

channels.description: Number of audio channels. 1 = mono (recommended for transcription).

speaker_device.description: Name of the multi-output device that includes BlackHole, used when -s flag is set.

blackhole_device.description: Name of the BlackHole virtual audio device for speaker capture.

language.description: Transcription language (ISO 639-1 code, e.g. en, fr, de). Use 'auto' for auto-detect.

group_consecutive_speaker_lines.description: When dual-source transcripts are generated, merge nearby consecutive lines from the same speaker.

source_include_timestamps.description: When dual-source transcripts are generated, include [MM:SS.s] timestamps in each line.

suppress_mic_bleed_duplicates.description: When dual-source transcripts are generated, drop mic lines that are near-duplicate speaker bleed.

mic_bleed_similarity_threshold.description: Similarity threshold (0-1) used for suppressing mic bleed duplicates; higher = stricter matching.

command_alias.description: Command alias/name displayed in help text and messages.

open_transcript_app.description: Command used by the TUI 'Open transcript' button (e.g. 'code', 'code -r', 'default'). Use 'default' to open with the system default app.

record_here_by_default.description: When true, pressing Record from the TUI Home screen saves to ./docs/transcripts in the current directory (same behavior as --here).
